channel.title: Item
channel.description: well ive been trying to add an item that does the same action that a mystery box does which is give a random reward but im already using the mystery box for a starter what it does is it gives u a choice to choose "hybrid" "melee" "mage" but anyways im already using it and i wanna make another item for example "ship ticket" to do the same action which is give random reward .. yes i know it sounds alil confusing o.o :| but hopefully someone knows what im talking bout ;D thank you

strucker:

add the method anywhere, and then go to your packets and find the first option item andd add the item id and addItem(randomItem(), 1);

the first option item ?? im soo lost an pics or guides u can info me with … i know im asking for too much but ill accept anything thank you

item.title: Item
item.dc:creator: @clawz_tw1n clawz tw1n
item.description:
@clawz_tw1n wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:2, topic:481640”][code= java]public int randomItem() {
int[] items = {1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048};// your items here
return items[new Random().nextInt(.length)];

}[/code]
and then to make it give the items use

If you would have scrolled before making this post you would have found this.[/quote]
and 1 last thing where do i put that im kinda new to this

Read full topic
